name: mln-bib-poster
description: Reads bibs/items from stream, posts to MyLibraryNYC
author: NYPL

scripts.deploy-bib-production: node-lambda deploy --functionName BibPoster --environment production --configFile ./config/bib-production.env --role arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -b subnet-59bcdd03,subnet-5deecd15 -g sg-116eeb60 --profile nypl-digital-dev -S ./config/event-source-bib-production.json
scripts.deploy-item-production: node-lambda deploy --functionName ItemPoster --environment production --configFile ./config/item-production.env --role arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -b subnet-59bcdd03,subnet-5deecd15 -g sg-116eeb60 --profile nypl-digital-dev -S ./config/event-source-item-production.json
scripts.deploy-bib-qa: node-lambda deploy --functionName BibPoster --environment qa --configFile ./config/bib-qa.env --role arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -b subnet-21a3b244,subnet-f35de0a9 -g sg-aa74f1db --profile nypl-digital-dev -S ./config/event-source-bib-qa.json
scripts.deploy-item-qa: node-lambda deploy --functionName ItemPoster --environment qa --configFile ./config/item-qa.env --role arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -b subnet-21a3b244,subnet-f35de0a9 -g sg-aa74f1db --profile nypl-digital-dev -S ./config/event-source-item-qa.json
scripts.deploy-bib-development: node-lambda deploy --functionName MyLibraryNYC-Bib-Poster --environment development --configFile ./config/deploy_development.env --role arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution --profile nypl-sandbox -S config/event-source-bib-development.json
scripts.deploy-item-development: node-lambda deploy --functionName ItemPoster --environment development --configFile ./config/item-development.env --role arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution  --profile nypl-sandbox -S config/event-source-item-development.json
